import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./BirthdayPage.css";import SurpriseModal from"./SurpriseModal";import Confetti from"react-confetti";import useWindowSize from"react-use/lib/useWindowSize";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BirthdayPage(){const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);const[confetti,setConfetti]=useState(false);const{width,height}=useWindowSize();const preUploadedImage="/background.jpg";// Path to the background image
const preUploadedMusic="/music1.mp3";// Path to the music file
const preDefinedName="Tanvi";// Predefined name
const currentTime=new Date().getHours();let greetingMessage="";if(currentTime<12){greetingMessage="Good Morning, Happy Birthday Radhe";}else if(currentTime<18){greetingMessage="Good Afternoon, Happy Birthday Tanu";}else{greetingMessage="Good Evening, Happy Birthday Tanvi";}const handleOpenModal=()=>{setConfetti(true);setTimeout(()=>{setConfetti(false);setShowModal(true);},2000);};const handleCloseModal=()=>setShowModal(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"birthday-container",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${preUploadedImage})`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"glass-overlay",children:[confetti&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Confetti,{width:width,height:height}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"birthday-title",children:[greetingMessage," \uD83C\uDF89"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"birthday-question",children:"Do you want to see a surprise?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"birthday-button",onClick:handleOpenModal,children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SurpriseModal,{show:showModal,onClose:handleCloseModal,name:preDefinedName,musicFile:preUploadedMusic})]})});}export default BirthdayPage;
